programme.title: Close Encounters Down Under
programme.desc: Rural Australia: Visit Australia's vast expanses, where farmers have been finding mutilated cattle. Plus, meet Phil Tindale who believes he witnessed two UFOs in combat. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Dolphin Saviours, Grim Reapers, Hysterical Strength: A look at dolphin rescues, death-smelling pets and a skinny teen with unbelievable strength. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Blood Lines: Ashley's negotiating skills cause a feud with Seth. Les is threatened with a trip to the hospital and is forced to make a decision that will change the business. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Star Children: Experts comb history for evidence of children with strange abilities and great knowledge. Could these young people have been born from ancient aliens? (S6, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Treasures Of The Gods: Across the world, there are stories of treasures that have been lost for centuries. Could these ancient relics have been hidden by extraterrestrials? (S6, ep 7)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 25)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: King of Orange Chicken: Rene declares himself the king of Orange, but Dusty isn't quite ready to concede the title. Meanwhile, Kenny accidentally reinvents the wheel. (S14, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lego My Locker: Darrell must deal with Kimber's eyes on a competitor, Dusty unpacks what could be the ultimate assistant and Rene pulls off one of his greatest profits. (S14, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reign or Shine: King Darrell strives to defend his throne, but Rene and Casey signal their intentions to undermine his plans. Meanwhile, Kenny gets bowled over by his locker. (S14, ep 9)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The King of Montebowl-o: Barry turns up to auction armed with a present for a certain hustler. Meanwhile, Brandi and Bozek get a firm grip on a smaller unit. (S14, ep 10)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Friday The 13th: Strange things are happening in the Swamp. It's Friday the 13th, and Daniel and Big Tee are after a bait-stealing monster called The Ghost. (S11, ep 6)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Deadeye Driver: The swamp heats up as Daniel and Big Tee face off against trespassers. Meanwhile, an old-timer teaches Troy some new tricks. (S11, ep 7)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: One Man Army: At the midway point of alligator season, Troy makes an urgent plea. Jacob and Don fish the deep waters of West Grand Lake where the biggest bull gators lurk. (S11, ep 8)

programme.title: Seized At Sea
programme.desc: Agents must abort a mission when a tropical storm rolls in. A cruise ship passenger balks at paying US duty on cigarettes. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Airport Security USA
programme.desc: Passengers are searched for illegal objects when entering and leaving the United States by the Department of Homeland Security's Customs and Border Protection officers. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Atlantis Apocalypse: A volcanic eruption in Santorini 3,500 years ago caused a tsunami that destroyed a Minoan civilisation and prompted the Atlantis myth. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Toxic Cloud: A toxic chemical cloud from an industrial accident could jeopardise an entire community within minutes, putting the lives of thousands of people at risk. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens And The Lost Ark: Theorists investigate whether sought-after religious relic the Ark of the Covenant could hold connections to our extraterrestrial past. (S6, ep 2)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens And Mysterious Mountains: Throughout time, people have believed mountains were the home of the divine. But could these hilltop spirits have been extraterrestrials? (S6, ep 3)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens In America: Experts investigate strange carvings from 8,000 BC and unexplained sightings in the New World. Is there more to the US's past than history books suggest? (S6, ep 4)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens And Stargates: Experts investigate remote ruins, mysterious caves and legendary mountain portals. Could these alleged stargates have brought ancient aliens to Earth? (S6, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Star Children: Experts comb history for evidence of children with strange abilities and great knowledge. Could these young people have been born from ancient aliens? (S6, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The UFO Superhighway: With so many strange reports of UFOs, animal mutilations and more, a specific latitude north of the Earth's equator has been dubbed 'the UFO Superhighway'. (S16, ep 8)

programme.title: The Next Nostradamus
programme.desc: Dr Bueno de Mesquita claims to have an algorithm that predicts future events. Having already foreseen Al Qaeda's role in 9/11, it now predicts global disaster. Can we argue with maths?

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Gateway to Hell: A fire-breathing crater burns in the middle of a desert, a deadly shark lurks on a golf course, and a giant white blob threatens a town in California. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Return of the Ice Monster: A giant ice creature is spotted in Alaska, a jet has a close encounter with a UFO, and evidence of a lightning strike invites paranormal speculation. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: New. Stephanie Lazarus: Will Mellor and a team of experts uncover the case of ex-LA detective Stephanie Lazarus, who was convicted of murdering her former boyfriend's wife. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: New. Stephanie Lazarus: Will Mellor and a team of experts uncover the case of ex-LA detective Stephanie Lazarus, who was convicted of murdering her former boyfriend's wife. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: A convicted drug dealer on the run is apprehended by officer Ryan, while a sister waits anxiously for the release of her brother in Miami. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: In Tauranga, police dog Falcon swoops in on a fugitive who's left a trail of destruction, while drug hound Yarra discovers a less than festive find. (S11, ep 9)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Wellington Delta team Regan and Taylor chase a violent man who runs from his vehicle, while Biosecurity beagle Archie gets spicy for Dog Squad guest star Indie. (S11, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Gold Hustle: Les goes over the edge when Ashley's bad attitude loses the shop a big customer. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Sibling War: Tensions in the store threaten to boil over as Seth and Ashley clash once again. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Les' Way: As a new customer shows up at the store with a potentially world-changing item, Les clashes with Seth over the future of the business. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Sucker Punch: Les frantically searches for a buyer in order to win a bet with Seth. Later, a revelation sends a pair of customers on a rampage. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: It's Always Sonny In Texas: The buyers head to Fort Worth, where a local auctioneer stirs up trouble when he joins as bidder. (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ka-Chingaladas!: Auctions in Garland bring a day of dashed hopes and sweet profits. Plus, a new buyer begins to throw some of the bidders off their game. (S5, ep 4)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Swinging With The Jenemy: The bidders return to Dallas hoping to land a locker of a lifetime. Mary flouts the law in her eagerness to score a dream unit. (S5, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: British Invasion: The big money buyers find themselves out of their comfort zones in DeSoto. A new face from across the pond threatens to ruin Ricky and Bubba's day. (S5, ep 2)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit top collector Stuart Imber before preparing to sell their latest finds at the Fairford Steam. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Allen Millyard and Guy Willison are back! This time they head to Dorset to meet Tim, the owner of a delectable collection of trinkets. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There:...
programme.desc: UFOs at Sea: Journalist Tony Harris and his team of experts will present and analyse evidence of unidentified submerged objects and render a verdict. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Seeing is Believing: For decades, governments around the world have investigated UFO sightings. How are these top-secret studies conducted? (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Inside UFOs: Those who claim to have been abducted by extraterrestrials give their accounts of the interior of their spacecrafts. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: A father and son see mysterious lights near their property and call the sheriff's office. A large craft covers a French town in an odd material. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Night to Remember: Barry plans romantic gestures for Lainey on prom night, Erica and Geoff try to attend the event together and a nerdy girl asks Adam out. (S4 Ep19/24)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Dynamic Duo: Barry tries to drive a wedge between Adam and Pops when they discuss a recently released Batman movie. Erica messes up her college interview. (S4 Ep20/24)

programme.title: The Neighborhood

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Cornhole: Calvin enters a competitive cornhole tournament - even though he's never played the game before. Marty asks Malcolm to be his best man. (S5 Ep11)

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to the Bachelor Party: A bombshell about Marty's future leaves Calvin and Tina reeling, and Dave unleashes his wild side at Marty's bachelor party. (S5 Ep12)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister, Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sports of the lawnmower, motorbike and bicycle variety.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey Loves Lionel: Barry takes inspiration from Lionel Richie and sets about creating a sculpture of Lainey as the ultimate Valentine's Day gift. (S3 Ep14/24)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Weird Al: Adam plans to reignite his fading relationship with Dana by taking her to a concert. Barry and Erica worry that Murray may be feeling depressed. (S3 Ep15/24)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Edward 'Eddie the Eagle' Edwards: Barry seeks fresh inspiration when he loses his standing as a champion athlete at school. Sales at Murray's shop nosedive. (S3 Ep16/24)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Dirty Dancing Dance: Erica suggests the film Dirty Dancing as the theme for the upcoming school dance, but Principal Ball refuses to sanction her idea. (S3 Ep17/24)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: 12 Tapes for a Penny: Adam joins a mail-order music club, hoping to assemble a huge tape collection. Barry realises that Lainey's father doesn't like him. (S3 Ep18/24)

programme.title: Lego Masters New Zealand

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto wedi addo edrych ar l Gloywen y fuwch goch gota, ond mae e'n llwyddo i'w cholli hi! When Guto loses Lili's ladybird, he embarks on a dangerous chase to recover the precious pet.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chn i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tn a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tn and friends in the village.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddynt chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc. Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Pan mae ei grys-T newydd yn cosi mae'n gwrthod gwisgo unrhyw ddillad! Pablo finds an itchy label in his T-shirt and decides not to get dressed!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Llwyd yn ffeindio hen ddarlun brwnt o gr eu cyndeidiau ac mae Gwich yn cynnig dechrau cr newydd. Badger finds a painting of the Riverbankers' ancestors choir - inspiration perhaps?

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Cadi, y gyrrwr trn, mewn trafferth pan fydd dwy ddraig ifanc yn mynd 'i hinjan stm am daith heb ofyn. Trouble for Cadi when young dragons take her steam engine for an unplanned trip.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero yn ymuno Sim a'i ffrindiau i fynd ar antur y tu mewn i frechdan i dynnu lluniau o atomau i Faer Oci. Blero joins Sim and friends on a mission inside a sandwich to take photos.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian a Loli wedi diflasu mynd o gwmpas Oriel, ac felly'n rhewi eu rhieni ac yn mynd i chwilio am gaffi. Deian and Loli freeze their parents and go looking for a cafe and some havoc!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Fi Fach yn mynd rhy bell wrth bryfoco Mwmintrol. Fi Fach goes too far in teasing Moomintrol. As a result he decides to write a letter which causes Mwmian to return and take Fi Fach away.

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Ymunwch Cadi, Luke, Jed a Miriam yn y gyfres gomedi hon. Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda Seren Sassy, Mic Moc a'r Anhygoels. Plenty of fun with Seren Sassy, Mic Moc and the Anhygoels.

programme.title: LEGO Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae'r merched yn ymarfer ar gyfer y ras, ond pan ymuna Dotie Rae a'i ffrind mynwesol gyda Y TIM, does dim stop arnyn nhw. The girls learn of Dottie Rae's long-lost love and bring him in.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Cawn ddarganfod mwy am dai bach gyda'r gwyddonydd Bedwyr ab Ion Thomas. We discover more about toilets: since when have they existed, how do they work, & where does all the pee and poo go?!

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch a Cath Ddu
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Heddiw: Lloyd a Heledd yn mentro i'r llethr sgio, dysgu am y sled gyda dau o dm Prydain, sialens cyrlio ar y rinc a Chlwb Sgio Pembre yw'r olaf i wynebu Sialens y Sgwad. Today: skiing.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Lili yn cael trafferth efo'r seinydd clyfar ac yn archebu pethau annisgwyl wrth geisio holi am gerddoraieth. Anni and LIli are having trouble with the smart speaker. [SL]

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr
programme.desc: Pennod 1. Tristian, Sam a Catrin sy'n cael rhannu'r llwyfan a pherfformio gyda'u harwr Huw Chiswell. Three people perform with their musical idol. Special appearance by Band Pres Llareggub. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Eurof sydd yn y stiwdio steilio heddiw - cyn brifathro sy'n caru popeth rygbi ac sy'n byw mewn shorts a dillad chwaraeon! Today, Eurof - a former head teacher - gets the makeover treatment. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref Llandudno sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. Geraint Hardy journeys around Wales - this week, what Llandudno has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys 2022
programme.desc: Am y tro olaf, mae'r pobyddion yn cystadlu am y brif wobr gyda 'theganau' retro yn yr Ystafell De! The finalists serve retro cakes at Richard's Tea Room. Who will be this year's winner? [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar arlunio byw, yn cartio ac yn cael gwers arwyddo Makaton. This week Scott tries out life drawing, karting and has a Makaton signing lesson. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Heno, sgwrs efo'r ymladdwr cawell o Bontarddulais, Brett Johns, fydd yn rhannu straeon o'r galon am ei fywyd a gyrfa heriol. Tonight Elin chats under the stars with cagefighter Brett Johns. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Mae Chris yn Sweden, lle mae'n profi clasuron y wlad cyn cyfarfod 'i arwr bwyd Niklas Ekstedt.Chris is in Sweden sampling classic Swedish dishes and meeting his food hero Niklas Ekstedt. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Wendy, Efan, Glyn a Mari sy'n ein tywys ar hyd prom Aber; i Raeadr Fawr; drwy ddyffryn Gwy; ac o Harlech i Landanwg. Walks in Aberystwyth, Abergwyngregyn, Wye Valley and the Harlech coast. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Dan Bwysau
programme.desc: Awn i Adran Argyfwng Maelor Wrecsam; cawn olwg onest ar be sy'n achosi eu problemau a sut ma'r ysbyty am ddatrys pethau. We take an unflinching look at Wrexham Maelor's Emergency department. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden. [SL]

programme.desc: Mae Wini'n cyfarfod ag ystlumod mae hi eisiau chwarae nhw, ond mae'r ystlumod yn hedfan i ffwrdd. O na! Wynona encounters some bats she wants to play with, but the bats fly away. Oh-no!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Huw a'r criw sy'n caslgu sbwriel ar un o draethau Ynys Mn, bydd Meia ac Elsa yn wyna ar eu fferm ger Aberystwyth, a Meleri sy'n ymweld gardd go arbennig yng Nhydweli. Outdoorsy fun.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio eu gorau glas i guddio buwch rhag Magi. Sin and his friends try their best to hide a surprise cow for Maggie.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae cocos yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddo. Guto wants to know where cockles come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae heddiw'n ddiwrnod Cystadleuaeth Sglefrio yng Nghwmtwrch a mae pawb yn ymuno yn yr hwyl hyd yn oed Twm Twrch! Today there is a Skating Competition in Cwmtwrch.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn mynd ar nerfau ei gilydd. Ond wedi noson yng nghwmni eu cefnder annifyr, buan mae pethau'n newid. Joni and Jini get on each other's nerves but soon enough things change.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, creaduriaid yr ardd fydd yn cael y sylw: y Mwydyn a'r Pry cop. In this programme we look at animals that live in our garden: the Worm and the Spider.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r breichledi 'Gwna di, gwna fi' yn gadael i chwaraewyr gopio symudiadau Bow Wow Bwgi ei gilydd. The 'You Do, I Do' bracelets let players copy each other's Bow Wow Boogie moves.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cynwyd Sant sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chware llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cynwyd Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings from Cyw.

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Mae'r rhaglen hon yn dilyn y gyfres o ddigwyddiadau rhyfeddol ddigwyddodd yn yr eiliad gyntaf mewn hanes. The remarkable events that took place in the first ever second in history.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Sioned yn dangos sut i luosogi planhigion efo torriadau gwaelodol, ac Adam yn trwsblannu yn yr ardd lysiau. In Pant y Wennol, Meinir creates a large planter out of an old filing cabinet.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Tro hwn, cawn drefnu priodas Jennifer ac Iolo o Dal-y-sarn, sy'n awyddus i briodi ar ben Yr Wyddfa. This time - the wedding of Jennifer and Iolo, who want to get hitched on Yr Wyddfa.

programme.title: Bwrdd i Dri
programme.desc: Yn y gyfres yma mae 3 seleb yn paratoi pryd o fwyd 3 chwrs i'w fwynhau gyda'i gilydd. Mae'r 3 chogydd heddiw yn gerddorion adnabyddus yng Nghymru. The 3 cooks today are famous musicians.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn ystod oes pan mae bywyd gwyllt o dan fygythiad difrifol, edrycha Iolo ar gyflwr natur Cymru. During an age in which wildlife is under threat, Iolo looks at the state of Wales' nature.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Y tro yma, mae Alwenna y nyrs yn ceisio dod o hyd i gartref i'w ffrind newydd - Frankie'r ffured, a ras i achub dafad yn geni a chi bach. The vets care for a ferret, a sheep and a puppy!

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Crwydr gyda Harri Parri i ddarganfod hanes diwylliant Pen Llyn heddiw. Harri Parri asks whether the culture of Pen Llyn is still flourishing in a changing world.

programme.title: Ralio: Ynysoedd Canarias
programme.desc: Rhaglen uchafbwyntiau yn dilyn digwyddiad rasio modur Rali Islas Canarias 2025, a gynhaliwyd dros 4 diwrnod o (24-27 Ebrill). Highlights programme following the 2025 Rally Islas Canarias.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd ag Arwel Williams o Borthmadog, sy'n mwynhau llnau simneiau a sgwrsio da'r cwsmeriaid ac sy'n feiciwr brwd ar benwythnosau. We meet a chimney-sweeping character from Porthmadog.

programme.title: Y Seintiau Newydd v Cei Connah
programme.desc: Rownd Derfynol byw Cwpan Cymru JD '24/25: Y Seintiau Newydd v Cei Connah. Rodney Parade. C/G 16.00. Live '24/25 JD Welsh Cup final: The New Saints v Connah's Quay. Rodney Parade. K/O 16.00.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Bydd Nia yn Aberhonddu i ddysgu mwy am etifeddiaeth grefyddol y fro - Cadeirlan Anglicanaidd y dref, hen gapel Cymraeg y Plough a mwy. We learn more about Brecon's rich religious heritage.

programme.title: New: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Gyda mond 5K ma Trystan ac Emma yn derbyn her i drawsnewid iard chwarae Canolfan Deulu y Bala efo help y cynllunydd Gwyn Eiddior. This time, we transform Canolfan Deulu y Bala playground.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Mae Barry mewn twll sy'n amhosib dianc ohono, mae iechyd meddwl Peter yn gwaethygu, a Simon am waredu ar Barry. Barry is in an inescapable hole and Peter's mental health is deteriorating.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Stori Leanne Lewis a ddioddefodd trais yn y cartref cyn gwneud y penderfyniad i ddatgelu beth oedd yn digwydd. Devastating first hand account of domestic violence survivor, Leanne Lewis.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres gyda Aled Samuel a'r hanesydd adeiladau, Bethan Scorey, yn edrych ar gartrefi yng Nghymru. Y tro hwn, byddwn yn edrych ar dai gweithwyr. This time, we focus on worker's houses.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Yn y bennod olaf awn i Drefach Felindre, byd y melinau gwlan. Cawn flas o fywyd y pentre gan John Crossley sydd wedi byw a gweithio yno ers tro. Last in series and we're in Drefach Felindre.

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: During One Night
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Directed and written by Sidney J Furie. Starring Don Borisenko & Susan Hampshire. A sensitive story of two airmen. One with a terrible injury and one dealing with life. [S]

programme.title: The Girl On The Pier
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Veronica Hurst, Ron Randell & Marjorie Rhodes. Rivalry between a Brighton crooner who has done time and his partner in crime, who is being blackmailed. [S]

programme.title: Tell Me Another
programme.desc: Showbusiness Colleagues. 1976. Personal anecdotes as told to Dick Hills. This episode stars Liza Goddard, Alfred Marks, Jack Parnell, Joan Turner & Kenneth Williams. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: The Reluctant Warriors. 1964. Narrated by Sir Michael Redgrave. It's 1939. A wonderful summer in Britain comes to an end. On September the third, a voice is heard on the radio. It is war. [S]

programme.title: Cotton Queen
programme.desc: 1937. Comedy. Director Bernard Vorhaus. Stars Will Fyffe, Stanley Holloway & Jimmy Hanley. Rival cotton mill owners work together to win a contract when love blossoms between the rival's siblings. [S]

programme.title: Murder at the Grange
programme.desc: 1952. Drama. Directed by Victor M. Gover. Starring Tod Slaughter & Patrick Barr. A private investigator is approached by two old ladies who say they are being terrorised. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of April and beginning of May. [S]

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Rings of Saturn. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Libby Morris & Ronnie Stevens. While observing Saturn, the crew notice a meteor shadowing the Galasphere, but discover it is a Saturnian spacecraft. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Devil's Fingers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Marilyn Hanold. Batman and Robin must stop a nefarious concert pianist who's plotting to kill Bruce and marry Aunt Harriet. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Alchemist of Rouen. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Julie Alexander & Trader Faulkner. Richard must investigate when Lady Rosalie informs him that her fianc has been bewitched by an alchemist. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: False Alarm. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. The Supercar team receives a distress call instigated by Masterspy to rescue two geologists trapped in the mountains. [S]

programme.title: The Rescue Squad
programme.desc: 1963. Family. Directed by Colin Bell. Stars Christopher Brett, Shirley Joy & Peter Butterworth. A group of children attempt to retrieve their toy plane from the top of an abandoned tower. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Bagpiper. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Hugh McDermott. A wild Highlander clansman returns to the outlaw camp, causing trouble for Robin's men, and he reveals plans to take down the Sheriff. [S]

programme.title: The Incredible Petrified World
programme.desc: 1959. Sci-fi. Directed by Jerry Warren. Stars John Carradine, Robert Clarke & Phyllis Coates. Four explorers find themselves trapped in underwater caves when the cable on their diving bell snaps. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Glamour Gets a Passport
programme.desc: 1964. A fabulous glimpse of the fashion industry, with a look at its export plans.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Vision. 1959. Starring Bruce Gordon, Pernell Roberts & Peter Miles. During WW1, four French Soldiers are put on trial for deserting their posts and cowardice. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Drama at Space City. 1963. Stars David Graham, Sylvia Anderson & Paul Maxwell. While on holiday, Steve and Venus leave Zoonie with Commander Zero's son, but they soon start to cause chaos.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Crater 101. 1968. Stars Sylvia Anderson, Gary Files & Cy Grant. Scarlet, Blue and Green go on a dangerous mission to remove the Mysteron complex's power source before an atomic device destroys it.

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Barbara Dennek & Rita Maiden. When Monsieur Hulot has to contact a US official in Paris, he gets lost in the complexity of the modern city. [S]

programme.title: A Gunman Has Escaped
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Stars John Harvey, John Fitzgerald, Robert Cartland. Written by John Gilling. Three armed robbers kill a passer-by in a robbery and flee the city. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Scot Free. 1976. Stars John Blackburn, Rupen Budhdeo, Douglas Fielding & Pat Gorman. Two boys are trapped in a disused mine, but why is their friend terrified of going to the police? [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1970. Brothers In War. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Philip and David clash over a woman. Robert's mother has trouble accepting that he has now grown up. [S]

programme.title: The Cassandra Crossing
programme.desc: 1976. Drama. Director: George P Cosmatos. Stars Sophia Loren, Richard Harris, Burt Lancaster & Martin Sheen. Passengers of a European train can't escape after a deadly virus is planted. [S]

programme.title: Cause Clbre
programme.desc: 1987. Drama. Directed by John Gorrie. Stars Helen Mirren, Harry Andrews & David Suchet. The story of Alma Rattenbury and her young lover, who were jointly accused of murdering her elderly husband. [S]

programme.title: Cause Clbre
programme.desc: 1987. Drama. Directed by John Gorrie. Stars Helen Mirren, Harry Andrews & David Suchet. The story of Alma Rattenbury and her young lover, who were jointly accused of murdering her elderly husband. [S]

programme.title: The Velvet Touch
programme.desc: 1948. Thriller. A police captain (Sydney Greenstreet) must solve the murder of a producer. Was it his ex or his ex ex? Stars Rosalind Russell, Leo Genn & Claire Trevor.

programme.title: Captain Scarlett
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Director: Thomas Carr. Stars Richard Greene, Leonora Amar & Manolo Fabregas. Scarlett returns to France to find the Duke of Corlaine seizing property and terrorising resistors. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Pigeon Decoy/Fishing with a Dog Nobbler. 1980. Jack Hargreaves demonstrates the use of a mechanical pigeon decoy before going trout fishing with an artificial minnow called a 'dog nobbler'. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy VsCrimeInc.
programme.desc: 1941. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Michael Owen & Jan Wiley. Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.

programme.title: Look At Life The Other Film World
programme.desc: 1965. A marvellous look at how the film camera is used in science and industry to increase an individual's knowledge.

programme.title: Star Performance: The Deceiving Eye
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Alvin Ganzer. Stars Frank Lovejoy & Ann Robinson. A professor works with the police to prove that eyewitnesses can't be trusted, but things take an unexpected turn. [S]

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: 1954. War. Directed by Stuart Heisler. Stars Tony Curtis, Frank Lovejoy & Mary Murphy. The story of four marines as they embark on a hazardous mission to find the location of Japanese minefields. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Great Feud. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Donna Douglas & Raymond Bailey. The Clampett clan takes great offense when Sonny jilts Elly, and they start a feud with the Drysdales. [S]

programme.title: The Naked Hills
programme.desc: 1956. Western. Directed by Josef Shaftel. Stars David Wayne, Keenan Wynn & James Barton. An Indiana farmer develops an insatiable thirst for gold and sets off to find fortune in California. [S]

programme.title: Larry Adler

programme.title: Batman

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Big Skate/Pannage. 1986. Jack Hargreaves recounts a trip to Shetland in search of large fish. In his second film, he witnesses pigs dealing with a bumper crop of acorns. [S]

programme.desc: 1/8. Suffolk boatyard specialists Mary and Simon's dream is a futuristic aquatic pod. They're experts in their aquatic field, but have they taken on more than they can handle?

programme.title: My Floating Home
programme.desc: 2/8. Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

programme.title: My Floating Home
programme.desc: 3/8. Seasoned floating homeowners Pat and Sue plan to spend their retirement on a state-of-the-art Dutch barge. But will their expensive tastes sink the project?

programme.title: My Floating Home
programme.desc: 4/8. In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done?

programme.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: 2/3. What is really in those budget sausages? How are chickens reared and how much of the poultry from supermarkets are contaminated with a deadly bacteria.

programme.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: 3/3. What secrets in the labels for children's food? Stefan puts his health on the line as he eats nothing but supermarket ready meals for a whole month.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: 28/35. Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to create a Thai-inspired garden for Justin and Linda, with a relaxing space for remembrance.

programme.title: Garden Rescue

programme.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
programme.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

programme.title: Hussy
programme.desc: Helen Mirren stars as a sex worker who begins an affair with a shady colleague at their high-class London cabaret. Can their relationship survive? Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: Mary Millington: Playbirds
programme.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.
